thread.title: Storm Ewan to batter UK with 70mph winds, rain and snow | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Storm Ewan to batter UK with 70mph winds, rain and snow | Daily Mail Online

author: Emily Chan For Mailonline
title: Storm Ewan to batter UK with 70mph winds, rain and snow | Daily Mail Online
text: After the devastation of Doris, prepare for Storm Ewan: UK will be battered by 70mph winds, rain and snow as the country is plunged to -2C Severe weather warnings for strong winds issued for north-west England, Wales and eastern Scotland Britain is bracing for a cold snap brought in by an Arctic wind, which also bring a band of showery weather Temperatures are set to fall to lows of -4C overnight in the north and -1C in the south at the start of next week Storm Doris caused devastation on Thursday and may have left Britain with a bill of more than Â£400million
